name: test_simple_chat_responses[desktop-testdata1]
description:
Validate chatbot responses semantically using OpenAI embeddings.
    Also validate multilingual behavior: English (LTR) and Arabic (RTL).

parameters.name: testdata
parameters.value: {'prompt_en': 'Who are you?', 'expected_en': 'I am GovGPT, your AI assistant specializing in providing accurate and clear answers about government services and related topics. My goal is to help you by offering reliable information in a respectful and easy-to-understand manner, always in line with Emirati values and Islamic principles. If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to ask.'}
